description: Tabnine is the AI code assistant that accelerates and simplifies software development while keeping your code private, secure, and compliant.
title: Tabnine AI code assistant | Private, personalized, protected
introduction: Tabnine is an AI code assistant trusted by millions of developers and thousands of companies. It offers AI-powered development platforms for individuals, small teams, and businesses, with features like code completions, AI chat agents, and enterprise-grade security. Tabnine provides personalized AI agents tailored to the user's code and company standards.
features: AI chat agents in the IDE for code generation, testing, and documentation
Switchable AI chat models from Tabnine and third-party providers
Integration with Atlassian Jira and Confluence
Ticket-based support and training on AI-enabled software development
pricing: Tabnine offers three plans: Basic (free), Pro ($12 per user per month with a 90-day free trial), and Enterprise ($39 per user per month with a 1-year commitment).

faqs.question: Is there a free trial available?
faqs.answer: Yes, there is a 90-day free trial for the Pro plan.

faqs.question: What is the pricing for the Enterprise plan?
faqs.answer: The Enterprise plan costs $39 per user per month with a 1-year commitment.
